title: Victor Sauvage
overview: After twenty years of traveling the world to take care of wild animals, Victor decided to get closer to his children aged 10 and 15. This is why he accepted the proposal of his childhood friend, Laurent, to take over the management of the Paraclete animal reserve. Victor still finds himself very sensitive to the charm of his wife, Mathilde, whom he has never stopped loving. For her part, if she had really turned the page, she would have asked for a divorce, right? Unless she has found comfort and tranquility with this "brave Henri", the good friend of always... Baptiste and Zo√© rediscover a full-time father, and Victor must now assume shared custody of his children. A mission at least as demanding as his job as a veterinarian, and for which he is not quite prepared. Twenty years in the bush makes you forget the refueling at the supermarket and the traffic jams! But Victor chose this "reconversion" because he no longer wanted to live away from his children. Basically, he just changed jungle...
